extends CacheObservable
implements Cache

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(Object object)
        Updates an saved instance within the Cache.

        If the Object-type (Class) of your provided Object is set inside the Cache, this will update the previously saved instance with the new provided one.

        If it is not set, nothing (apart from logging an warning) will happen.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        object - the Object that should be updated

      • addNew

        public void addNew(Object object)
        Sets an new instance into the Cache.

        If the Object-type (Class) of your provided Object is not yet set inside the Cache, this will set the provided instance.

        If it is already set, nothing (apart from logging an warning) will happen.

        Specified by:
        addNew in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        object - the Object that should be updated

      • addAndOverride

        public void addAndOverride(Object object)
        Sets an new instance into the Cache, ignoring previously set instances.

        If the Object-type (Class) of your provided Object is not yet set inside the Cache, this will set the provided instance.

        If the Object-type (Class) of your provided Object is set inside the Cache, this will update the previously saved instance with the new provided one.

        Specified by:
        addAndOverride in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        object - the Object that should be updated

      • remove

        public void remove(Class clazz)
        Removes whatever instance is associated with the provided Class.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the Object you want to remove from this Cache

      • get

        public <T> Optional<T> get(Class<T> clazz)
        Returns the internally maintained instance for the provided class.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Cache
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type, defined by the class
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class you want want to get the instance for
        Returns:
        an Optional, empty if nothing is set.

      • isSet

        public boolean isSet(Class<?> clazz)
        Returns, whether an instance exists for the provided class or not.
        Specified by:
        isSet in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class you want to check for
        Returns:
        true, if the type is set, else false

      • addCacheObserver

        public <T> void addCacheObserver(CacheObserver<T> cacheObserver)
        Adds a CacheObserver to this Cache.

        Any set CacheObserver will be notified whenever the call of Cache.update(Object), Cache.addNew(Object), Cache.addAndOverride(Object) or Cache.remove(Class) successfully passed for the Object you want to listen to.

        Those callbacks are a great way (and in fact needed for the Registration mechanism) of getting notified.

        Specified by:
        addCacheObserver in interface Cache
        Type Parameters:
        T - the Type of that CacheObserver
        Parameters:
        cacheObserver - the CacheObserver, that should listen to this cache

      • removeCacheObserver

        public <T> void removeCacheObserver(CacheObserver<T> cacheObserver)
        Removes a CacheObserver from this Cache
        Specified by:
        removeCacheObserver in interface Cache
        Type Parameters:
        T - the Type of that CacheObserver
        Parameters:
        cacheObserver - the CacheObserver, that should be removed

      • addGeneralObserver

        public void addGeneralObserver(GeneralCacheObserver observer)
        Adds an GeneralCacheObserver to this Cache.

        GeneralCacheObserver will be notified whenever any object changes within this Cache.

        It is recommended to use Cache.addCacheObserver(CacheObserver), instead of this method.

        Specified by:
        addGeneralObserver in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer, that should listen to this Cache

      • removeGeneralObserver

        public void removeGeneralObserver(GeneralCacheObserver observer)
        Removes a GeneralCacheObserver from this Cache
        Specified by:
        removeGeneralObserver in interface Cache
        Parameters:
        observer - the Observer, that should be removed

        public void clearObservers()
        Deletes all Observers.

      • acquire

        public void acquire()
             throws InterruptedException
        Acquires access over the object. If any other Object has access over the given Object, this Methods waits until the current owner calls release.
        Specified by:
        acquire in interface Mutex
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the waiting takes to long.

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases the access over the Object and invoking any waiting Threads.
        Specified by:
        release in interface Mutex
